summary: FORD COUNTRY IN HENDERSON NV .WE RECEIVED A RECALL FOR TAKADA INFLATOR.   WE CALLED ABD,WAS TOLD BY FORD COUNTRY BOTH DRIVER AND PASSENGER AIR BAGS WERE IN  BROUGHT CAR IN ONLY HAD DRIVER BAG.  MADE ANOTHER APPT WITH FORD COUNTRY FOR PASSENGER AIRBAG, WAS TOLD THEY DON'T HAVE PASSENGER AIRBAG AND DON'T KNOW WHEN IT WILL BE IN.  ALSO, THE DRIVER AIRBAG ALSO NEEDS TO BE REPLACED AGAIN DUE TO ANOTHER RECALL.  WE ARE AFRAID TO DRIVE OUR CAR AND WANT TO KNOW WHY US FORD NOT DOING SOMETHING. .WE HAVE A GRENADE READY TO GO OFF ANYTIME. WHY DOESN'T FORD DISASSEMBLE THE AIRBAGS FOR NIW
